reviews.review: I think we did a pretty good job so far
You will get reported for pallet looping, and banned for a fucking month! Game is hella fun if you are playing with AT LEAST 1 friend, otherwise i dont recommend.

On average players can grind shards at 4.32 per minute of in-match time. 

259.2 per hour in-match.

Figuring conservatively we'll say 15% of time is spent in MM queue. (anyone who's played knows how unlikely a wait time that short is.)

It takes 9000 shards to unlock a new character.

Thats 40 hours of grind to unlock one character. 

Thats a full time work week.

Assuming just minimum wage US, $7.25, each character cost the equivalent of....

$290 USD

Grinding all the killers would cost the equivalent of $3,190 USD, plus $40 for the hard pay -walled characters.

Likewise $3,190 USD worth of your time grinding for the 11 survivors, plus $50 for the hard pay-walls there.

When you do the math like that it really is a bargain that t he devs are willing to let you have the whole game for only a couple hundred bucks.

Dead by Daylight, A game where you think you can have fun. Then you realize its just a bunch of losers who have 2 options... Either play the killer and kill people who whine about being killed, or play the survivor and get generators every single game. There is nothing new  to the game that is fun, there needs to be more excitement to the game rather than the same boring thing, Its a great game if you want to take a nap then continue playing though gl!

Apparently if you disconnect too frequently, (usually do to another player disconnecting or poor connection to the host) you get banned for a week. With no prior warning. Contacted the Dead By Daylight team. Extremely unhelpful. Basically a complete waste of my time and money. Game is great, wouldnt recommend it though, based on how ive been treated however.
Exciting scary game. That's fun. Good development work.

Let's say you enter a survivor game
right from 10 seconds in the killer finds you, you spend an entire game being chased, you make all the right moves you flashlight at every pallet, running all your loops and that killer is eating wood every turn, you shake them for a few seconds, but they have whispers so you just start being chased again since they endlessly patrol looking for you

but miraculously you keep the chase going the entire game all the gens get fixed and you make a fantastic escape: To a no-pip, you just got chased the entire time and didn't acquire score in any other areas 

Don't buy this unless you plan on commiting 150 hours at minimum to reach a barely passable level of competence

Are you okay with loading screens sometimes not loading which means you have to restart the game and try the same thing again? Then this game might just be for you.

I am joking, but there is a serious undertone to it. The game is pretty solid, theres plenty of playstyles to choose from wether you want to be chased or be the one to chase. If youre the survivor you have to adapt your playstyle accordingly to the killer. Thats genius, but also makes you face 4 out of 13 killers most of the time because of balancing issues. For the price you will have alot of fun, but dont consider DLC's without playing the game for sometime and finding your prefered playstyle first,

I like to enjoy games with friends whenever the option comes up and so when i struggle to actually join my friends lobby i get mildly irritated to say the least. The game has been out for years and the loading screen bug has been there since
day 1 and theres nothing saying they will try to fix the issue. Plenty of people have tried and the one way that i SOLVED it (Potentially! I havent encountered the issue since!) was to follow this method: Windows + R > Insert: %localappdata% > Proceed to delete engine.ini and gameusersettings.ini in the DeadbyDaylight folder. > Finally go to steam and "Verify game files"

Boot up the game and the issue will hopefully be fixed.

8/10 If i couldnt solve the loading screen issue i would downright give it a 0.

Хорошая игра, с проработанной физикой и всеми деталями. Если тебе скучно и ты не знаешь что поделать? Не беда, иди играть за выжившего: экшен, оры, горящий пукан. Пришёл уставший и злой после работы бери своего любимого маньяка и иди ебашить четырёх пездюков которые так и наровят что бы их долбанули. Все эти качества содержатся в этой игре. Оценка 10 бомбящих выживших из 10! Советую!

怎么说呢，万圣节入的DBD的坑，之前做了三年的云玩家，也应该有一点小资格去评价了。
首先，游戏的确是一款好游戏，而且是第一家把“不对称竞技游戏”做大做火的。但在国内，都知道被广电封禁了。再加上今年的d5抄袭风波，这个游戏在国内真的是凉了，虽然没有像进化那样凉的彻彻底底，但也跟守望屁股差不了多少。
对开发商提一些建议吧，虽然不知道能不能看到：
1，举报系统。这个有很多人在吐槽，只要有火衣、用红处、上顶级配件就举报。重点是还能举报成功，这让那些老玩家怎么有心情玩游戏？被封号之后申诉还不一定能回来，打盘护士就被4个人骂，技不如人还举报有什么意思？
2，外挂。我已经不知道看过多少主播遇到那个挂狗了，皮脸布巴直接传送到地下室锯死四个人，然后马上退款再重新买游戏，官方也什么都不做，真的是服了。
3，屠夫跟人类的玩家在低段位完全不成正比。玩人类的5秒钟就能匹配到其他人，玩屠夫的5分钟10分钟排不到人都是正常的。希望可以改一下匹配机制。
4，高端局节奏太快，第一个人倒的时候已经3个机了，如果不救人的话3跑都是很正常的，官方可以加强一下人类，但不是一味的削板子削窗户，可以设法让人类不能一直修机，等等..
5，不知道要写什么了。祝杀鸡明年可以取得更好的成绩！
祝杀鸡越来越好

- The SBMM update made this game sweatier than R6 siege, Apex or big games like CSGO LOL DOTA2
- This new system is so brain dead because even if you perform poorly and play like a 5yo in that game if somehow you survive(being carried,baby/afk/farming) the game considered you to be good and your next game become an E-sport grand finale due to how sweaty that match is going to be.
The same rule also applied to the killer the only different is that your killer's level matter(High level killer will meet high rank surv). Got 2+kills last game? prepare to sweat.
- The balancing is also very bad, if you ask any good player to give you a recommendation for survivor perks they probably mention at least 2 meta perks and for the killer's one they will surely tell you to practice Nurse, Spirit, Blight since out of "25" killers only 5-6 killers are viable if you actually want to kill those surv. 
the balancing is so broken people sticks to meta perks becasue it's the only things that can counter some killer's play style(tunneling, camping) and killer only play those characters because the other killer is too easy to counter and generator flies like they are nothing if you don't have gen stopping perks.
- The game is also full of cheaters and glitches to the point where those thing became a running joke due to how common they are.

This was once a fun, creative, wonder of a game. The concept was amazing and the gameplay was addicting, but over the years it never got consistently better. This idea of "balance" on a purely casual game is one of the reasons why, I believe there should be no such thing as a meta and the game should 100% be played how the player wants to play. A meta implies there's a right/strong way to play, which should have NEVER existed in a game like this. The large variety of perks and abilities each side has encourages creativity and experimentation which can never be put into practice because of the simple fact that one thing is significantly better then the other, so you have no reason to ever use your other options. The developer team behind this game is laughably incompetent and their idea of "balance" isn't even at least good. The game is one sided, anyone with over 100 hours will tell you that; killer isn't fun anymore, survivor queue times take around 10 minutes for a match that could end as quickly as it started. The developer team never listens to the community and when they do they choose to listen to the more toxic side of the community. Which, by the way, were created by the team themselves because in any "competitive" game, people want to naturally win, some more then others per say, which breeds the toxicity. The team themselves are greedy and care more about the short term health of the game over the long term health. For example the "Darkness Among Us" chapter was poorly designed, lazy, had absolutely no inspiration, and suspiciously seemed more like they wanted a killer whom they could make a bunch of simple cosmetics for, that people would want to buy. Even after that catastrophe they seemed to not have learned their lesson, for years the community have begged for them to lesson the grind players have to go through to get what they want in this game, which they still haven't listened to. 

I myself admit I was once in love with this game, and part of the toxicity it breeds. But over the years as I got older I realized these truths about the game and never want to touch it again. As an older, on and off player of this game I would not recommend this game, or at the very least if you buy it don't give this team any more of your money unless they truly deserve it, which they do not. Go buy left 4 dead 2 or something, it may be old but its sure as hell not a bad game.

If you have taken the time to read this review and are willing to have a reasonable discussion in the comments on why you disagree, you're more then welcome to. But the information I have stated is all true, until changes are made it will remain 100% true.

纵使拉了周围人入坑，自己也算玩的挺久的，但我依然觉得这游戏有很多的地方需要仔细打磨。可惜制作组现在出新皮肤出的可得劲了，正常的bug修复，游戏更新和平衡性调整却需要一个月甚至两个月。还有作为主要玩人类的话，每次更新都是加三个废柴技能就可以了，不像新杀手有新的能力。人类的道具之类的要是也能随版本增加的话那可玩性也会继续提升吧。希望制作组赶快加入段位奖励之类的，否则很多人都选择拔线掉段打鱼。杀鸡过了这么多年有变好也有变坏，但它确实，让我和朋友们一起度过了一段美好的时光。

Venho, finalmente, fazer a revisão desse game.
Infelizmente, não pode (mais) ser positiva. O rumo que o jogo tomou torna impossivel avaliar como experiência positiva, o gameplay do mesmo. A quantidade de atrocidades que leva o jogo, passa os pontos positivos que até eram bem maiores em versões anteriores.

Geral: Bugs... bugs, bugs, bugs...
Tudo começa quando os desenvolvedores (que eu desconfio nem mesmo saberem o que estão fazendo, mas que clamam terem feito um [i]pretty good job so far[/i](?)) resolveram tentar implementar um balanceamento (em um jogo o qual deveria ser desbalanceado, saca?!) Desde então, o jogo que era divertido e interessante, pois foi bem novidade na epoca de seu lançamento, virou essa desgraça que hoje temos aí.
Vamos a um resumo do que você pode encontrar dentro dessa caixa de Pandora após gastar 37 contos.
 -O jogo tem tantos que fazem parecer que o jogo ainda está em fase de acesso antecipado.
Atrualização anual: Jogo virou agenda política e um completo scam. Pague pra ter personagens nerfados e qualquer coisa que os desenvolvedores acharem do momento. Um desperdicio total de um bom game que ja foi. 
-Bugs de survivor onde você não consegue passar por cantos onde forças do além tumulo te impedem, lags absurdos que te fazem teleportar mai que o Goku, coisas que horas podem ser feitas, horas não, dependendo da cara do freguês...
-Bugs de Killer: Novamente, lugares que você não consegue passar por que o killer é muito "gordo" ou muito alto, física horas existe, horas não; Perks/habilidades que horas funcionam ou não....

-A comunidade... aaahhh a comunidade....
Se você quer jogar um jogo numa sala fechada com outros retardados, onde a tensão ja está no limite, esse jogo é para você! A comunidade no geral não sabe o que faz, não tem vontade nenhuma de aprender e acha que estão arrasando.
Você vai encontrar dementes que, após assistirem um ou dois videos de Ochido, pensam que, com 5 minutos de jogo, podem replicar as mesmas jogadas e truques. Resultado; Um bando de imbecís correndo sem rumo, caindo em menos de 10 segundos de partida.

A um ano à trás, eu recomendaria esse jogo a todos e daria um positivo.... No momento, não existe como. Eu comprei em promoção, paguei 28 conto nele e hoje eu gostaria de ter esses 28 pra gastar em cartas steam, mas não nisso. Decepção total.

Quer ponto positivo? Deixa eu ver... O som ainda é bom. Quando você consegue jogar com outras 3 pessoas espertas e em call, ou no modo "friendly", é divertido. Tirando isso, é um jogo que vai fazer seu sangue subir mais rápido que a nota do preço da gasolina.

*Edit*
Depois do Update de hoje, dia 11 de Dezembro, o jogo ficou injogavel. Mais uma vez, coisas mudaram de lugar, layouts diferentes, drop de frame rate de 60 para menos de 20 em certas ocasiões, ainda menos pallets, pallets gerados em locais inuteis.... A desgraça segue. Desenvolvedores não se decidem no que querem fazer e sobra para os jogadores que não conseguem nem se adaptar em tempo das mudanças anteriores e ja sofrem com novas mudanças sem sentido. Jogo absolutamente destruído.

Edit 06-2019: Jogo ainda uma droga. Matchmaking ridiculo te põe com ranks totalmente aleatorio de survivor e de killer, a criação de um lobby leva entre 7 a 10 minutos. Muitos erros ainda e nada de fixes mas cosméticos eles lançam. O valor de UM cosmético chega a ser quase o preço do jogo. Modo de jogo totalmente arruinado com essa atualização de "end game" fazendo inútil o propósito de fazer geradores. Virou um jogo de "quem abacalha mais e vive por ultimo" vence. Chato demais.

Edit 09-2019: Jogo lagado, pesado, travando. Nenhum lobby verde. Todos amarelos e acima de 120 ping. Injogável. Novos atributos ridículos, estragando ainda mais o que uma vez ja foi divertido.

Игра очень классная! Постоянно играю. Особенно с друзьями. Механику по началу тяжело понять, но со временем понимаешь как и что. Все советую поиграть. А вот кемперы реально бесят) Когда маньяк повесит тебя на крюк и смотрит прямо тебе в лицо. Спустя время , я понял, что кемперы это люди у которых низкая самооценка, удачи))) =3
